direccion: Av. de Las Américas,junto al Aeropuerto, Intl. Jose Joaquin de Olmedo, Guayaquil, Guayas

comentarios.comentario: Excellent Since moving to Ecuador we have stayed at this hotel many times. Our stays are always perfect! The staff is very accommodating and provides services equal to 5 star hotels in the US. The rooms are very comfortable with amenities such as robes, slippers, multiple toiletry items and 24 hour room service. The resturant menu and breakfast buffet are excellent as well as providing superb wait staff. The hotel also provides 24 hour airport drop off and pick up. I’ve made reservations for pickups weeks in advance and they are always there when I exit the airport; even when our flight is delayed by hours and we arrive at wee hours of the morning. I have recommended this hotel to many friends who visit and need a place to stay before and after flights. I know there are less expensive places in the area, but the dedication and care provided by their customer service is worth every penny!See more

Excellent Everything about this property is top notch. From the drivers/taxis they arrange, to the hotel staff, the quality and variety of food, to the constant cleanliness of the building; all of it is, as I say, top-notch. This is a superbly managed and well-run hotel.
Excellent We enjoyed our one night stay.

Excellent This is the best hotel I've found for being pet friendly. We are traveling with my cat and I requested a litter box for her. When we arrived, they already had the box set up in the room and it was an excellent experience for myself and my cat.
Excellent Clean, convenient location with shuttle to/from airport, good restaurant, very attentive staff.

Terrible I paid extra for the right to cancel my reservation in the event of something coming up and my travel was delayed so I was not able to check in on time. Neither the property nor Orbitz was willing to honor my cancellation insurance and I received no satisfaction. Boycott Holiday Inn AND Orbitz!
Terrible Beware!!! the person in the front desk told us we had complementary breakfast and end it up charging us $73 for it. I would never stay here again.
Excellent Staff was friendly and accommodating . Rooms were well appointed and clean
Excellent
Excellent Really good location

direccion: Av. Francisco De Orellana #236, Guayaquil, Guayas, 00000

comentarios.comentario:
Okay The staff was great.   There is one restaurant downstairs, but the food is not great, and it's too noisy.  
I tried to go to the gym or sit by the pool, but my card only could access the floor where my room was located. 
There are many hotels in the area, but this one has the least amenities and the location is not the most convenient.
Excellent Great experience! Friendly staff. very clean!

Excellent I've been into many hotels in my life and in here in Guayaquil I've been into several different ones this is the finest Hotel I've been in the service the quality of Staff the atmosphere the desire to serve the customer. The food the availability of services the Outreach of the staff to ensure that things were as they were or should be and if they could change or adjust or help to make things better they were most gracious and joyful in their service. Well laid out Hotel amenities everything you could want for at a very very fair price when you compare it to the hotels in town here the service quality safety all of these things add up to make for joyous occasion I spent four nights here with my daughters celebrating my birthday the staff allowed my daughter's to work with them to put on a small event in the dining room for breakfast with a mariachi band which all the customers got to enjoy and we had a wonderful celebration so yes this is our new home base in Guayaquil. Thank you so muchSee more
Excellent Good service, clean place!

Okay I fall down on the bath tube the first night in the hotel 
The bath tube was slippery 
I hurt my back badly
Excellent The staff was great. Had a event and was very organized
Okay

Terrible Tuve una de las peores experiencias en este hotel. No lo recomiendo para nada. Viaje junto a mi hermana llegamos a nuestra habitación y olía literal a pies y no, a limpio. Llamamos enseguida a front desk y vino un señor a ver la habitación y efectivamente el también sintió que olía algo raro. Esperamos como 30 min. Nos cambiaron de habitación y al momento que me iba a bañar habían 5 cabellos en la pared del baño, volvimos a llamar para dar la queja en este punto solo queríamos descansar. Esto fue el colmo y al momento de hacer el check out lo único que pudieron decirnos es que nos obsequiaban el servicio de planchado de un pantalón, premio de consuelo de $2,50. No es un hotel barato, es un hotel costoso y nunca te esperarías algo así de un Marriott. NO LO RECOMIENDO See more
Excellent The j hi otro is well located and the staff insect friendly. Strongly recommend.
Good Restaurant service is bad and has little racism on Asian

comentarios.comentario: Okay I’ve been a guest for many years because my husband it’s from Ecuador, but this time was last time I will spend my money there. Room as by the street and I couldn’t sleep because the  constant noise from traffic. They start to charge parking fee ( before was included) and when we checked out we had to wait 10 min until somebody went  to check the rooms  and count the towels and make sure we didn’t steal anything. OMG yes I know  it’s a first time for me too. Like I will pay $ 200 to steal your towel.  Plenty of other choices around .

comentarios.comentario: Good
Good it was ok in general, but the time during the register it taking so long.

Excellent This is my 2nd time staying at this hotel. I got no complaints, and I would definitely come back on my future visit to Ecuador.
The staff was very polite, attentive, and responsive. The check-in and check-out process is pretty fast, and there is always someone I can talk to or call.
I had a problem this time with the safe box. I had to call twice for someone to come; on my second call, they sent the guy in charge within 10 minutes. It is understandable; there are other people requesting assistance as well, so it was a big deal.

Terrible Nos quedamos en este hotel por su cercanía al aeropuerto. No espere mucho del personal de recepción. Pedimos información sobre locales de comida en el edificio y nos dieron información incorrecta. Afortunadamente uno de los botones que nos ayudó con las maletas ha escuchado la conversación y supo ayudarnos y nos dio la información correcta acerca de lugares de comer. 
Las habitaciones son pequeñas, viejas, las sábanas amarillentas, toallas viejas y tiesas, el baño pésimo, el lavamanos no se podía utilizar salía el agua por 2 segundos debido a sensores que terrible idea para una habitación de hotel. La alfombra que daba cosas pisarla nada que ver con la marca Wyndham. 
Había música alta que se escuchaba en nuestra habitación 
No regresaremos a esta ubicación.See more

direccion: Clemente Ballén 406, entre Chile y Chimborazo, Guayaquil, Guayas, 901563

comentarios.comentario:
Excellent Unipark was recommended by a family member and I have to say it did not disappoint. From the moment we checked-in until we checked out we were greeted by very friendly staff who went out of their way to make us feel welcome and made sure we enjoyed  our stay.  Our room was delightful with a nice view of the park and the cathedral, everything was clean and comfortable. The hotel’s restaurant had amazing local dishes! It is conveniently located within a shopping center next to the hotel. Right outside of the hotel there are taxi services that are ready to take you anywhere you want but the hotel is conveniently located within walking distance of shopping areas and restaurants. 
I am really happy that we booked our reservation with Unipark, The hotel is beautiful but the outstanding factor is hands-down the staff from the desk clerks, bellmen, housekeeping and the restaurant staff. All made our stay worth while and look forward to staying there again. See more
Excellent The valet person at C/I was amazing and helpful. Darwin at the restaurant was very attentive and courteous.

Excellent There are so many great things about this hotel and it’s staff. I don’t know where to begin. First, the hotel is clean, modern, and well organized. The staff makes you feel at home and treat you like a VIP all the time. In particular, there are three Valets, Cesar, William, and Mauricio, at the front desk that have gone above and beyond making me feel special, attending to any need that I have, and are extremely friendly. The hotel bar staff, Carol and Jennifer, are also friendly and attentive.
The hotel restaurant provides some of the best tasting food you can imagine. The breakfast buffet itself is incredible with a variety of breads, danishes, juices, hot and cold dishes, and you name it. I would also like to point out the Restaurant Captain, Darwin. He personally greets all the guests and has no problem bringing you coffee himself. He will go all out to make sure everyone has what they need.
I also want to mention that I was getting close the the end of my stay and my airlines contacted me to re-book for a later date due the a hurricane advisory on my return trip. I went to reservations and Belen was fantastic in making sure I could not only stay the extra days I needed but was able to keep me in the same room. I really appreciate Belen's efforts.
These are just some of the people I know by name but I can assure you that every staff member from this Hotel does the best they can to be friendly, polite, and ensure you are taken care of. See more

Good The hotel is in a great location. The room was clean and spacious enough for the two of us. We stayed here in two occasions so two different rooms. The first was on the 5th floor- the room was ok, but it looked old. The second time was on the 8th floor which was clearly newer but the carpet smelled like mold so it triggered my allergies badly.
Excellent The overall experience was magnificent. Friendly and accommodating staff. Room service was an A .
Excellent

Excellent Firstly, the great service. The room I was first given had an awful view! I asked if I can get another room with a decent view, I was immediately, and without hesitation, given an incredible upgrade, with an unbelievable upgrade! Secondly,  a very good breakfast buffet! Next the location was just perfect! Finally, the staff was very fría de helpful! Strongly recommend this hotel!
Excellent Recomendado
Excellent
Good Personal increíble, recepción, bar y comida deliciosa. Solo les falt un poco de decoración en los cuartos muy tristes y simples. Gracias x su estadía.🖖
Okay Expensive
Excellent Excelente servicio, localización  e instalaciones
Excellent
Excellent
Excellent

Excellent El hotel es cómodo. Los empleados son serviciales. Mi única queja es que no consegui una dirección para poder llegar al estacionamiento(había que tomar otra ruta) y esto dificulto nuestra entrada al hotel.

Good Good hotel in central location. Food at onsite restaurant was exquisite and a few nice restaurants locally which provided a varied experience. Shame about the two power cuts in the one morning (one unplanned) as there is still considerable build work ongoing. No soundproofing between rooms either and avoid anything near the lifts of a light sleeper
Excellent Beautiful hotel and amazing room. Super breakfast.
Excellent The hotel is new. The roof top pool is amazing. Good location. Pet friendly. Excellent staff, very accommodating.
Excellent Excellent hotel; very impressed and I have no complaints. It's a new place, super modern. The room they gave me had an EXCELLENT view of the river.

Excellent Once again it was a pleasure to come back to my "home" away from home. The same great staff that still remembers me and my likes. The "courtesy" cocktail was bought back which was a surprising pleasure. The food was EXCELLENT, will be having breakfast there from this day forth. The elegance of the hotel  is beyond describing (you have to be there to "feel" it). I let GM Rosie know that we need to be consistent with the incredible staff they have.
